overview.en: Based on Token Economics,EverySave uses two major technologies - AI and Blockchain - to empower the F&B industry, leading the 'Exquisite Cuisine Alliance' to a new era of value distribution in which everyone puts in their contribution and everyone receives the benefits.
overview.zh: 大家省，以通证经济为基础，利用人工智能和区块链两大科技赋能餐饮行业，带领“精致美食联盟”走向人人贡献、人人受益的新价值分配时代。
